addonManifest.name: RabbitMQ Integration
addonManifest.description: Provides developers a mechanism to provision connectivity to RabbitMQ
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: This Add-On assumes that you already have RabbitMQ instance running, configured with Basic authentication, and credentials for a user with admin privileges. The admin user will be leveraged to manage users and vhosts. Created for Apprenda 6.5.3
addonManifest.developerHelp: No additional information is required to provision your connection to RabbitMQ.
addonManifest.author: bgregorius@apprenda.com

property.description: Port that RabbitMQ Administration endpoint is running on
